implicitPoint3D_TPI(p1:l1x;7;1024;2.931951556539587e-013;144.0000000000005;l1y;7;1024;2.931951556539587e-013;144.0000000000005;l1z;7;1024;2.931951556539587e-013;144.0000000000005;d1;6;1024;8.706837334449009e-014;48.00000000000014)
implicitPoint3D_TPI(p2:l2x;7;1024;2.931951556539587e-013;144.0000000000005;l2y;7;1024;2.931951556539587e-013;144.0000000000005;l2z;7;1024;2.931951556539587e-013;144.0000000000005;d2;6;1024;8.706837334449009e-014;48.00000000000014)
implicitPoint3D_TPI(p3:l3x;7;1024;2.931951556539587e-013;144.0000000000005;l3y;7;1024;2.931951556539587e-013;144.0000000000005;l3z;7;1024;2.931951556539587e-013;144.0000000000005;d3;6;1024;8.706837334449009e-014;48.00000000000014)

pdx pdy pdz
pex pey pez

pexd = pex * d1
peyd = pey * d1
pezd = pez * d1
aex = l1x - pexd
aey = l1y - peyd
aez = l1z - pezd // d1

pexd2 = pex * d2
peyd2 = pey * d2
pezd2 = pez * d2
bex = l2x - pexd2
bey = l2y - peyd2
bez = l2z - pezd2 // d2

pexd3 = pex * d3
peyd3 = pey * d3
pezd3 = pez * d3
cex = l3x - pexd3
cey = l3y - peyd3
cez = l3z - pezd3 // d3

dex = pdx - pex
dey = pdy - pey
dez = pdz - pez // 

aexbey = aex * bey
bexaey = bex * aey
ab = aexbey - bexaey // d1d2
bexcey = bex * cey
cexbey = cex * bey
bc = bexcey - cexbey // d2d3
cexdey = cex * dey
dexcey = dex * cey
cd = cexdey - dexcey // d3
dexaey = dex * aey
aexdey = aex * dey
da = dexaey - aexdey // d1
aexcey = aex * cey
cexaey = cex * aey
ac = aexcey - cexaey // d1d3
bexdey = bex * dey
dexbey = dex * bey
bd = bexdey - dexbey // d2

abc1 = aez * bc
abc2 = bez * ac
abc3 = cez * ab
abc4 = abc1 + abc3
abc = abc4 - abc2 // d1d2d3

bcd1 = bez * cd
bcd2 = cez * bd
bcd3 = dez * bc
bcd4 = bcd1 + bcd3
bcd = bcd4 - bcd2 // d2d3

cda1 = cez * da
cda2 = dez * ac
cda3 = aez * cd
cda4 = cda1 + cda3
cda = cda4 + cda2 // d1d3

dab1 = dez * ab
dab2 = aez * bd
dab3 = bez * da
dab4 = dab1 + dab3
dab = dab4 + dab2 // d1d2

al1 = aex * aex
al2 = aey * aey
al3 = aez * aez
al4 = al1 + al2
alift = al4 + al3 // d1^2

bl1 = bex * bex
bl2 = bey * bey
bl3 = bez * bez
bl4 = bl1 + bl2
blift = bl4 + bl3 // d2^2

cl1 = cex * cex
cl2 = cey * cey
cl3 = cez * cez
cl4 = cl1 + cl2
clift = cl4 + cl3 // d3^2

dl1 = dex * dex
dl2 = dey * dey
dl3 = dez * dez
dl4 = dl1 + dl2
dlift = dl4 + dl3 // 

ds1 = dlift * abc // d1 d2 d3
ds1n = ds1 * d3 // d1 d2 d3^2
ds2 = clift * dab // d1 d2 d3^2
dl = ds2 - ds1n // d1 d2 d3^2
dlm = dl * d1
dln = dlm * d2 // d1^2 d2^2 d3^2

dr1 = blift * cda // d1 d2^2 d3
dr1n = dr1 * d1 // d1^2 d2^2 d3
dr2 = alift * bcd // d1^2 d2 d3
dr2n = dr2 * d2 // d1^2 d2^2 d3
dr = dr2n - dr1n // d1^2 d2^2 d3
drn = dr * d3 // d1^2 d2^2 d3^2

det = dln + drn
